name: frizzled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food) made crisp (= pleasantly dry and hard) or slightly burned by frying or grilling: I made a salad of endive and roquefort with frizzled chorizo. Fry the pancetta until it is crisp but not frizzled. Top with frizzled onions.
(of plants, etc.) made very dry and smaller or burned because of too much heat: The plants had turned brown, brittle, and frizzled in the searing heat.

(of hair) very dry, curly, and not smooth or shiny: She had bushy, frizzled hair. The man had a frizzled grey ponytail.
